entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:40 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
